mapper.sql: id, step_id, result, suggestion, handle_time, handler_id, handler_name, level
mapper.insert: insert into wf_instance_user (step_id, result, suggestion, handle_time, handler_id, handler_name, level) values (#{stepId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{suggestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{handlerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{handlerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into wf_instance_user
step_id,
result,
suggestion,
handle_time,
handler_id,
handler_name,
level,
#{stepId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{result,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{suggestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{handleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{handlerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{handlerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update wf_instance_user
step_id = #{stepId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER},
suggestion = #{suggestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handle_time = #{handleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
handler_id = #{handlerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
handler_name = #{handlerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update wf_instance_user set step_id = #{stepId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, suggestion = #{suggestion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handle_time = #{handleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, handler_id = #{handlerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, handler_name = #{handlerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select _instance.temp_id as tempId, _instance.instance_id as instanceId, _instance.name as tempName, _step.step_name as stepName, _step.deadline, _step.begin_time as beginTime, _step.end_time as endTime, _user.id, _user.handler_id as handleId, _user.handler_name as handleName from wf_instance _instance,wf_instance_step _step,wf_instance_user _user where _step.step_id=_user.step_id and _step.instance_id=_instance.instance_id and _user.handler_id=#{handleId} and _step.status is null
